entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Marathon
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 00:47 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -9.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Marathon Airport 03:00 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023
Temperature: -9.5°C
Pressure: 101.8 kPa
Humidity: 82 %
Wind Chill: -17
Dewpoint: -12.0°C
Wind: SSW 18 km/h gust 37 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Periods of snow and local blowing snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 02:40 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Periods of snow and local blowing snow ending near noon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light near noon. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 23 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 02:40 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 12 in the evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 02:40 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023
